definitions.definition: To marry a member of another group, social stratum , or religion .
examples: Mary was Catholic and Ron was Jewish , but they decided that it was acceptable to intermarry .

definitions.definition: To marry within the same ethnic , social, or family group.

main_definition: To marry a member of another group, social stratum , or religion .
secondary_definitions: To marry within the same ethnic , social, or family group.
